TopicTitle: KSP DarkMultiPlayer server up and running full time

Articles.Content:
Just wanted to let you guys know that we have a KSP Multiplayer Server up and running 24/7. It is done by the Spearhead Gaming community and the IP is as follows:

Server Name: Spearhead Gaming Darkmod & Server IP: 50.97.34.100:6802

You can join in on Teamspeak in the dedicated KSP channel @ the following and that channel is under Misc Games:

Name:Spearhead Gaming

Address:det5.ts.nfoservers.com
Glad to see another server come online! Awesome!
